api_list.name: Search Building permits
api_list.description: View details on building permits by reference identifier
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com/BuildingPermit/AABBNNNN"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com/BuildingPermit/{permidid}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search business Licenses
api_list.description: Search business licenses issued in Pennsylvania.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com/Business/business license id"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com/Business/{id}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pa-open-data-portal.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
